title: He’ll Use His $200,000 Prize to Fight for Children
description: David Shalleck-Klein, who runs the Family Justice Law Center, is one of five New Yorkers to win a prize for city “change makers.”
dc:creator: James Barron
media:credit: Andrea Mohin for The New York Times
media:description: David Shalleck-Klein is one of five winners splitting this year’s $1 million David Prize.
